summary: This is an email from a prosecutor in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, sent on July 17, 2019, indicating the filing of a detention submission related to Jeffrey Epstein. It shows ongoing legal proceedings against Epstein at that time.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email and the detention submission that was filed, indicating he was the target of legal action by the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Filing of Epstein Detention Submission
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York filed a detention submission regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A detention submission regarding Jeffrey Epstein was filed by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on July 17, 2019.
The email indicates active legal proceedings against Epstein were ongoing in mid-2019.
The correspondence originated from a prosecutor identified as Co-Chief of the Public Corruption Unit.
